main event: A UFO observation occurred over Paterson, New Jersey on March 31, 1967, where a bright object with a flashing light hovered for several minutes before taking off at high speed.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 6-7 minutes., The object was described as a 'bright' entity above the horizon., Witnesses were unsure if it was an aircraft or a UFO., The object emitted a flashing light., There were multiple reports of UFO sightings around the same period in the area.
witness description: Boys aged 12 and 13 reported the sighting.
